song_lyrics: Āvo āvo param parvīn re; more jīvan Dharmadulāre...
Chandan khor kare sundar tan, bhushan basan navīn re... 1
Kundal kānu me badan sudhākar, dekhat dorat mīn re... 2
Jhuk rahe lochan pankaj par, bhrukuṭī bhramar adhīn re... 3
Krishṇānand kahe dīje darshan Hari, jānīke ab moy dīn re... 4
title: Āvo āvo param parvīn re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-361: Sadguru Krushnanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad

Raag(s): Yaman (Kalyãn)
